R1: If, for any reason, it exceeds 30 days, the process with the telephone company must be terminated.
R2: The telephone company must verify the accuracy of user personal information.
R3: When a customer receives a SIM card, the telephone company must activate the SIM card before the customer can use it.
R4: Before retrieving any type of personal data from data subjects, the data controller must obtain the consent of the data subject.
